statements.select:
SELECT ID AS Id,MerchantNo AS MerchantNo,LoginName AS LoginName,PassWord AS PassWord,CompanyName AS CompanyName,GroupName AS GroupName,LeaderName AS LeaderName,EName AS Ename,RegisterNo AS RegisterNo,RegisterPlace_Country AS RegisterPlaceCountry,RegisterPlace_Province AS RegisterPlaceProvince,RegisterPlace_City AS RegisterPlaceCity,RegisterPlace_County AS RegisterPlaceCounty,RegisterPlace_Street AS RegisterPlaceStreet,OfficePlace_Country AS OfficePlaceCountry,OfficePlace_Province AS OfficePlaceProvince,OfficePlace_City AS OfficePlaceCity,OfficePlace_County AS OfficePlaceCounty,OfficePlace_Street AS OfficePlaceStreet,ZipCode AS ZipCode,ContactPeople AS ContactPeople,PeopleTel AS PeopleTel,PeopleEmail AS PeopleEmail,WebSite AS WebSite,BusinessNo AS BusinessNo,Logo AS Logo,CreateUser AS CreateUser,CreateTime AS CreateTime,UpdUser AS UpdUser,UpdTime AS UpdTime FROM CompanyManage
ID = #value#

SELECT ID AS Id,MerchantNo AS MerchantNo,LoginName AS LoginName,PassWord AS PassWord,CompanyName AS CompanyName,GroupName AS GroupName,LeaderName AS LeaderName,EName AS Ename,RegisterNo AS RegisterNo,RegisterPlace_Country AS RegisterPlaceCountry,RegisterPlace_Province AS RegisterPlaceProvince,RegisterPlace_City AS RegisterPlaceCity,RegisterPlace_County AS RegisterPlaceCounty,RegisterPlace_Street AS RegisterPlaceStreet,OfficePlace_Country AS OfficePlaceCountry,OfficePlace_Province AS OfficePlaceProvince,OfficePlace_City AS OfficePlaceCity,OfficePlace_County AS OfficePlaceCounty,OfficePlace_Street AS OfficePlaceStreet,ZipCode AS ZipCode,ContactPeople AS ContactPeople,PeopleTel AS PeopleTel,PeopleEmail AS PeopleEmail,WebSite AS WebSite,BusinessNo AS BusinessNo,Logo AS Logo,CreateUser AS CreateUser,CreateTime AS CreateTime,UpdUser AS UpdUser,UpdTime AS UpdTime FROM CompanyManage
MerchantNo = #value#

SELECT ID AS Id,MerchantNo AS MerchantNo,LoginName AS LoginName,PassWord AS PassWord,CompanyName AS CompanyName,GroupName AS GroupName,LeaderName AS LeaderName,EName AS Ename,RegisterNo AS RegisterNo,RegisterPlace_Country AS RegisterPlaceCountry,RegisterPlace_Province AS RegisterPlaceProvince,RegisterPlace_City AS RegisterPlaceCity,RegisterPlace_County AS RegisterPlaceCounty,RegisterPlace_Street AS RegisterPlaceStreet,OfficePlace_Country AS OfficePlaceCountry,OfficePlace_Province AS OfficePlaceProvince,OfficePlace_City AS OfficePlaceCity,OfficePlace_County AS OfficePlaceCounty,OfficePlace_Street AS OfficePlaceStreet,ZipCode AS ZipCode,ContactPeople AS ContactPeople,PeopleTel AS PeopleTel,PeopleEmail AS PeopleEmail,WebSite AS WebSite,BusinessNo AS BusinessNo,Logo AS Logo,CreateUser AS CreateUser,CreateTime AS CreateTime,UpdUser AS UpdUser,UpdTime AS UpdTime FROM CompanyManage
LoginName = #Name#
PassWord=#password#

SELECT ID AS Id,MerchantNo AS MerchantNo,LoginName AS LoginName,PassWord AS PassWord,CompanyName AS CompanyName,GroupName AS GroupName,LeaderName AS LeaderName,EName AS Ename,RegisterNo AS RegisterNo,RegisterPlace_Country AS RegisterPlaceCountry,RegisterPlace_Province AS RegisterPlaceProvince,RegisterPlace_City AS RegisterPlaceCity,RegisterPlace_County AS RegisterPlaceCounty,RegisterPlace_Street AS RegisterPlaceStreet,OfficePlace_Country AS OfficePlaceCountry,OfficePlace_Province AS OfficePlaceProvince,OfficePlace_City AS OfficePlaceCity,OfficePlace_County AS OfficePlaceCounty,OfficePlace_Street AS OfficePlaceStreet,ZipCode AS ZipCode,ContactPeople AS ContactPeople,PeopleTel AS PeopleTel,PeopleEmail AS PeopleEmail,WebSite AS WebSite,BusinessNo AS BusinessNo,Logo AS Logo,CreateUser AS CreateUser,CreateTime AS CreateTime,UpdUser AS UpdUser,UpdTime AS UpdTime FROM CompanyManage
MerchantNo = #value#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO CompanyManage (MerchantNo,LoginName,PassWord,CompanyName,GroupName,LeaderName,EName,RegisterNo,RegisterPlace_Country,RegisterPlace_Province,RegisterPlace_City,RegisterPlace_County,RegisterPlace_Street,OfficePlace_Country,OfficePlace_Province,OfficePlace_City,OfficePlace_County,OfficePlace_Street,ZipCode,ContactPeople,PeopleTel,PeopleEmail,WebSite,BusinessNo,Logo,CreateUser,CreateTime,UpdUser,UpdTime) VALUES(#MerchantNo#,#LoginName#,#PassWord#,#CompanyName#,#GroupName#,#LeaderName#,#Ename#,#RegisterNo#,#RegisterPlaceCountry#,#RegisterPlaceProvince#,#RegisterPlaceCity#,#RegisterPlaceCounty#,#RegisterPlaceStreet#,#OfficePlaceCountry#,#OfficePlaceProvince#,#OfficePlaceCity#,#OfficePlaceCounty#,#OfficePlaceStreet#,#ZipCode#,#ContactPeople#,#PeopleTel#,#PeopleEmail#,#WebSite#,#BusinessNo#,#Logo#,#CreateUser#,#CreateTime#,#UpdUser#,#UpdTime#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ROWID() as value
statements.update: UPDATE CompanyManage SET BusinessNo=#BusinessNo# WHERE ID = #Id#
